DOC.brief_summary: Patients eligible for hormone ablation therapy who are prescribed Firmagon will be followed for a maximum of 3 years to estimate the progression free survival. Data on testosteron levels, QoL and LUTS will be collected if this information is available. Safety information (adverse events) will be collected.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Into the Effectivity and Safety of Firmagon, Prescribed for Treatment of Patients With Advanced Prostate Cancer
